catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 501
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: woodblock printed book containing text; a few charts; outdoor scene of people playing card games, fighting, talking; a chart with seals; figures in a boat; interior scene with lanterns; gray cover with brown and green pine cones and pine needles in lower half; yellow and pink labels on front cover
markings: Marks on front cover title, in pencil: [204 / III] ; URC inside front cover, in pencil: [III]; Seal LRC of title page: [Settei]
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Encyclopedia of Musical Theater Performances (Seikyoku ruisan 声曲類纂), vol. 4
